title: ParkWhiz: Book Parking Deals
summary: ParkWhiz saves you time and money on parking nationwide
developerAddress: 208 S Jefferson St, St. 403, Chicago, IL 60661

descriptionHTML:
Take the hassle out of parking with the ParkWhiz app. Find parking in any major city, compare prices, plus save up to 50% when you book in advance.

No more circling blocks worrying about finding a place to park.

Business? Check. Commuting? Yep. Going to a museum or a concert? Got it. Need airport parking? Even there. Book with ParkWhiz for all of your parking needs.

We contract with garages and lots across America for insider pricing and pass that along to you. Here's how it works:

- SEARCH thousands of locations across the nation
- COMPARE pricing to find the best option
- BOOK instantly
- PARK with your mobile pass

We’re the leading NYC app, sparing New Yorkers from alternate side of the street parking. From the most congested place in the nation, to Chicago, San Francisco, Boston, Los Angeles, and all points in between, ParkWhiz gets drivers parking for less.

Need help? We've got real people ready to assist. Our ace customer service folks will answer your call or text and get you on your way.

Call or text 888-472-7594
Email info@parkwhiz.com

To find out more:

Follow us on Twitter @ParkWhiz
Like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/parkwhiz
Learn more at www.parkwhiz.com
comments: Great app, wherever you can find parking it is great. Only problem is that they need to be in communication with the parking garages, more than once I've had to get a ticket and then meddle with people because there not there to scan your QR code

Fail. Might work if there's a scanner at the garage, but some garages require you to contact attendant for exit. No attendant answered, so I had to pay to open the gate and my fee paid through the app was wasted.

Love this app, saves me time and money in the big apple.  Finding street parking in NYC is horrible, this app finds nearby parking garages for the price that's fair.  I recommend this app to friends and family.
What a great app!!! Saves me tons of money because parking in DC is expensive!
Awesome app. Blows spot hero out of the water. Excellent..use it all the time in the city of Chicago.
Charged 13 dollars over the rate at the garage.  Ripoff!
